title: Drawing, "Incomplete Sketch of a Dead Tree", May 4, 1966
medium:
Recto:  Graphite, brush and watercolors on brown paper
Verso:  Graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite ?, at left drawing: "Oaks" / locality and date/place
description:
Recto: Vertical view of oaks, one standing behind the other at left and two more oaks at right.
Verso: An incomplete sketch of a dead tree at right edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Incomplete Sketch of a Dead Tree", May 4, 1966.
May 4, 1966. Recto:  Graphite, brush and watercolors on brown paper
Verso:  Graphite. Gift of Mrs. Samuel Colman. 1939-85-3.
